title: Pantheon is a girl??!?!

replies.body: Pantheon is a celestial being, the pantheon we know Is the aspect, in aurelion sols lore, the previous incarnation of pantheon was a woman
That is the most teenage highschool Twilight bat shit insane thing I've heard in any champion's lore in this entire game. Who the *fuck* wrote this guy's lore?
Did you even read Atrues' and Aurelion Sol's ore? If not, go read them. If you did, re-read them carefully.
Okay thank you I did misread lol
That was the old Pantheon. Pantheon is a title, not a name.

No I'm pretty sure Pantheon is a name given to a champ in our game, it sounds like the weaboo they got to write this guy's lore is trying to change pre existing lore, like with how Azir's release wrecked alot of champions lore because of it (Nasus, Renekton, Sivir, Cass, ect)

Then you haven't read pantheons new lore that came out weeks ago.(so yeah the previous one got retconned)
It clearly says that pantheon is the aspect of war,that inhabits a human body and that there have been other incarnations of him in the past.

Pantheon isn't a mantheon anymore. He's actually no longer really a humantheon anymore. Instead, he's an celestial alien that body snatches people throughout time and destroys the hosts will. Enslaving their bodies to do its bidding.  Lesser beings pray to it as a star God.   It's not though. Just a space parasite really. The one that holds the chain on the actual godlike being that the Targonians enslaved. 

I'm personally not a fan of the change.
Since people have already explained it to you, you might want to edit your main post.
Only the best, highest caliber top notch story writing goes into Riot's lore
